mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(order by id) as rownumber , id, userid, username, prodid, prodname, qiyemingcheng, loanamt, loanuser, faren, chengliriqi, zhuceziben, gszcd, hangyeid, zhuanli, lastsellincome, lastimcome, lastloanamt, sellincome, imcome, loanamt2, lianxiren, lianxidianh, status, checkuser, lurushijian, inputuser, lastchgtime from Tb_product_app )t where rownumber > = #{offset} and rownumber < = #{pageSize}+#{offset}

select count(*) from ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(order by id) as rownumber , id, userid, username, prodid, prodname, qiyemingcheng, loanamt, loanuser, faren, chengliriqi, zhuceziben, gszcd, hangyeid, zhuanli, lastsellincome, lastimcome, lastloanamt, sellincome, imcome, loanamt2, lianxiren, lianxidianh, status, checkuser, lurushijian, inputuser, lastchgtime from Tb_product_app )t

SELECT id, userid, username, prodid, prodname, qiyemingcheng, loanamt, loanuser, faren, chengliriqi, zhuceziben, gszcd, hangyeid, zhuanli, lastsellincome, lastimcome, lastloanamt, sellincome, imcome, loanamt2, lianxiren, lianxidianh, status, checkuser, lurushijian, inputuser,blastsellincome,blastimcome,blastloanamt, lastchgtime from Tb_product_app t where 1=1
and t.id=#{id}

SELECT id, userid, username, prodid, prodname, qiyemingcheng, loanamt, loanuser, faren, chengliriqi, zhuceziben, gszcd, hangyeid, zhuanli, lastsellincome, lastimcome, lastloanamt, sellincome, imcome, loanamt2, lianxiren, lianxidianh, status, checkuser, lurushijian, inputuser,blastsellincome,blastimcome,blastloanamt, lastchgtime from Tb_product_app t where 1=1
and t.id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into Tb_product_app (
userid, username, prodid, prodname, qiyemingcheng, loanamt, loanuser, faren, chengliriqi, zhuceziben, gszcd, hangyeid, zhuanli, lastsellincome, lastimcome, lastloanamt, sellincome, imcome, loanamt2, lianxiren, lianxidianh, status, checkuser, lurushijian, inputuser,blastsellincome,blastimcome,blastloanamt, lastchgtime ) values (
#{userid}, #{username}, #{prodid}, #{prodname}, #{qiyemingcheng}, #{loanamt}, #{loanuser}, #{faren}, #{chengliriqi}, #{zhuceziben}, #{gszcd}, #{hangyeid}, #{zhuanli}, #{lastsellincome}, #{lastimcome}, #{lastloanamt}, #{sellincome}, #{imcome}, #{loanamt2}, #{lianxiren}, #{lianxidianh}, #{status}, #{checkuser}, #{lurushijian}, #{inputuser},#{blastsellincome},#{blastimcome},#{blastloanamt}, getdate() )
mapper.update:
update tb_product_app set
userid=#{userid},
username=#{username},
prodid=#{prodid},
prodname=#{prodname},
qiyemingcheng=#{qiyemingcheng},
loanamt=#{loanamt},
loanuser=#{loanuser},
faren=#{faren},
chengliriqi=#{chengliriqi},
zhuceziben=#{zhuceziben},
gszcd=#{gszcd},
hangyeid=#{hangyeid},
zhuanli=#{zhuanli},
lastsellincome=#{lastsellincome},
lastimcome=#{lastimcome},
lastloanamt=#{lastloanamt},
sellincome=#{sellincome},
imcome=#{imcome},
loanamt2=#{loanamt2},
lianxiren=#{lianxiren},
lianxidianh=#{lianxidianh},
status=#{status},
checkuser=#{checkuser},
inputuser=#{inputuser},
blastsellincome=#{blastsellincome},
blastimcome=#{blastimcome},
blastloanamt=#{blastloanamt},
lastchgtime=getdate()
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select top 10 columkey , dytype , compName , dystatus , dytime from (select ID as columkey ,'1' as dytype ,username as compname ,STATUS as dystatus ,LURUSHIJIAN as dytime from tb_product_app where LURUSHIJIAN > DATEADD(day,-100,GETDATE()) union all select ID as columkey ,'2' as dytype ,username as compname ,STATUS as dystatus ,LURUSHIJIAN as dytime from tb_incre_app where LURUSHIJIAN > DATEADD(day,-100,GETDATE()) union all select ID as columkey ,'3' as dytype ,INCRENAME as compname ,STATUS as dystatus ,LURUSHIJIAN as dytime ,Incamt as amt ,'±»Ô¼Ì¸' as dytypedetail from Tb_guquan_app where LURUSHIJIAN > DATEADD(day,-100,GETDATE()) ) t order by dytime desc
